channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Aqua MicroScanner Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Aqua MicroScanner Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-10427|2024-08-04T22:24:18.183Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20aqua%20microscanner%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Aqua MicroScanner Plugin 1.0.7 and earlier transmitted configured credentials in plain text as part of the global Jenkins configuration form, potentially resulting in their exposure.

item.title: CVE-2019-10316|2024-08-04T22:17:20.428Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20aqua%20microscanner%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Aqua MicroScanner Plugin 1.0.5 and earlier stored credentials unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins master where they could be viewed by users with access to the master file system.
